casebody.data:
[The State ex rel.] Howard, Appellee, v. Industrial Commission of Ohio et al„ Appellants.

[Cite as State ex rel. Howard v. Indus. Comm. (1998), 88 Ohio St.3d 98.]

(No. 96-463 Submitted August 19, 1998 Decided September 9, 1998.) White, Getgey & Meyer Co., L.P.A., and Barbara F. Florez, for appellee. Betty D. Montgomery, Attorney General, and Steven P. Fixler, Assistant Attorney General, for appellants.

The judgment of the court of appeals is reversed on the authority of State ex rel. Tapp v. Parsec, Inc. (1998), 82 Ohio St.3d 417, 696 N.E.2d 591, and the cause is remanded to the court of appeals.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur.
